--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Codebook for NHGIS data file 'nhgis0009_ds10_1850_state'
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Contents
    - Data Summary
    - Data Dictionary
    - Citation and Use
 
Additional documentation on NHGIS data sources is available at: 
    https://www.nhgis.org/documentation/tabular-data 
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Data Summary
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Year:             1850
Geographic level: State
Dataset:          1850 Census: Population, Agriculture & Other Data [US, States & Counties]
   NHGIS code:    1850_cPAX
   NHGIS ID:      ds10
 
Tables:
 
1. Churches by Denomination
   Universe:    Churches
   Source code: NT47
   NHGIS code:  AET
 
2. Aggregate Accommodations of Churches by Denomination
   Universe:    Churches
   Source code: NT48
   NHGIS code:  AEU
 
3. Value of Church Property by Denomination
   Universe:    Churches
   Source code: NT49
   NHGIS code:  AEV
 
4. Total Number of Churches
   Universe:    Churches
   Source code: NT50
   NHGIS code:  AEX
 
5. Total Aggregate Accommodations of Churches
   Universe:    Churches
   Source code: NT51
   NHGIS code:  AEY
 
6. Total Value of Church Property
   Universe:    Churches
   Source code: NT52
   NHGIS code:  AEZ
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Data Dictionary
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Context Fields 
    GISJOIN:     GIS Join Match Code
    YEAR:        Data File Year
    STATE:       State Name
    STATEA:      State Code
    COUNTY:      County Name
    COUNTYA:     County Code
    AREANAME:    Area name
 
Table 1:     Churches by Denomination
Universe:    Churches
Source code: NT47
NHGIS code:  AET
    AET001:      Baptist
    AET002:      Christian
    AET003:      Congregational
    AET004:      Congregational-Orthodox
    AET005:      Dutch Reformed
    AET006:      Episcopal
    AET007:      Free Churches
    AET008:      Friends or Quaker
    AET009:      German Reformed
    AET010:      Jewish
    AET011:      Lutheran
    AET012:      Mennonite
    AET013:      Methodist
    AET014:      Moravian
    AET015:      Presbyterian
    AET016:      Protestant
    AET017:      Roman Catholic
    AET018:      Swedenborgian
    AET019:      Tunker
    AET020:      Union
    AET021:      Unitarian
    AET022:      Universalist
    AET023:      Minor Sects

Universe:    Churches
Source code: NT48
NHGIS code:  AEU

    AEU002:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Christian
    AEU003:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Congregational
    AEU004:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Congregational-Orthodox

    AEU006:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Episcopal

    AEU008:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Friends or Quaker
    AEU009:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> German Reformed
    AEU010:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Jewish
    AEU011:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Lutheran
    AEU012:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Mennonite
    AEU013:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Methodist
    AEU014:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Moravian
    AEU015:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Presbyterian
    AEU016:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Protestant
    AEU017:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Roman Catholic
    AEU018:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Swedenborgian
    AEU019:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Tunker
    AEU020:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Union
    AEU021:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Unitarian
    AEU022:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Universalist
    AEU023:      Aggregate accommodations of churches >> Minor Sects

    AEZ001:      Value of church property
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Citation and Use of NHGIS Data
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
All persons are granted a limited license to use this documentation and the
accompanying data, subject to the following conditions:

* Publications and research reports employing NHGIS data (either tabular or GIS)
  must cite it appropriately. The citation should include the following:

    Minnesota Population Center. National Historical Geographic Information
    System: Version 2.0. Minneapolis, MN: University of Minnesota 2011.

* Publications and research reports employing school attendance areas data
  (either tabular or GIS) must cite it appropriately. The citation should
  include the following:

    The College of William and Mary and the Minnesota Population Center.
    School Attendance Boundary Information System (SABINS): Version 1.0.
    Minneapolis, MN: University of Minnesota 2011.

* If possible, citations should also include the URL for the NHGIS site:

    https://www.nhgis.org/

* If possible, citations involving school attendance areas should also include
  the URL for the SABINS site:

    http://www.sabinsdata.org/

In addition, we request that users send us a copy of any publications, research
reports, or educational material making use of the data or documentation.
Printed matter should be sent to:

    NHGIS
    Minnesota Population Center
    University of Minnesota
    50 Willey Hall
    225 19th Ave S
    Minneapolis, MN 55455

Send electronic material to: nhgis@umn.edu
